name: Breakdown
overview: This 1992 Zzap!64 release alternates between three subgames: the first a Delta-style shooter, the second a platform-shooter, and the third a puzzler in which you must guide a ball to an off-switch before the timer runs out. The game has an ending after level 8. Published in the very last Zzap!64 Megatape #37 (11/1992).
